summary: WHEN THE BRAKES WERE APPLIED, THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED EXTENDED STOPPING DISTANCE WHEN ON A WET SURFACE.  THE DEALER WAS NOTIFIED.   *AK   THE BRAKE WAS APPLIED WITH EXCESSIVE FORCE AND THE PEDAL HAD GONE TO THE FLOOR.  AFTER 5 TO 10 SECONDS, THE BRAKES ENGAGED AND A LOUD GRINDING SOUND WAS HEARD ALONG WITH PULSATION WHILE COMING TO A SUDDEN STOP.  THE VEHICLE COLLIDED WITH AN SUV IN FRONT.  THE PASSENGER SIDE SEAT BELT HAD BROKE DURING THE ACCIDENT.   *SCC   *JB
